As of 2019 estimates suggest that there were just 48 metric tons of or produced in the u.s. iron ore is an important mineral substance that is used in the iron and steel industry . iron ore iron ore is mined in about 50 countries globally and is used almost exclusively to create steel .
gold: This statistic presents the annual net loss of mobile messaging platform Snap . In 2019 , the chat app had generated 1.03 billion U.S. dollars in net losses , a slight improvement from 1.56 billion U.S. dollars in losses in the preceding year .
